welcome_message_body: Welcome to Surabaya, a vibrant city known for its rich history, delicious cuisine, and friendly locals. Get ready to explore our charming streets, bustling markets, and beautiful landmarks. Enjoy your stay and make the most of everything Surabaya has to offer!

restaurants.name: Depot Santong Cwie Kiauw Mie
restaurants.description: Depot Santong Cwie Kiauw Mie is a noodle restaurant located in Surabaya.
restaurants.address: Pasar Atom Tahap 1 Lt. 1 (Jl. Bunguran No. 45), Surabaya, Jawa Timur 60161
